aboutPlatform.text: A highly functional project with an open source code for creating modern decentralized financial solutions supporting green projects

speed.text: The network has the maximum throughput, due to this, the transaction processing speed is increased and the delay is reduced

security.text: We use one of the most popular coding alphabets, which ensures complete security of the network and users (the Bitcoin network has a similar encryption system)

simplicity.text: The ability to create smart contracts, simple and easy conditions for business entry into the project

advantages.purpose: One of the main goals of the platform is to support green projects. When certain capitalization levels are reached, part of the profit will be used to finance such projects

ecosystem.description: The ecosystem includes many projects and products developed by the community

aboutUs.descriptionStart: Launched in 2020, Arbor is a global open source platform for decentralized applications. Based on the Proof-of-Stake consensus, Arbor strives to maximize the use of blockchain and implement it in all spheres of life.
aboutUs.descriptionEnd: The Arbor technology stack can be useful in any use cases that require security and decentralization â€” open finance, identity identification, games, confidential data, and many others

aquaWorld.title: Aqua World
aquaWorld.description: Our partner, for whom we have developed a database and accounting system based on blockchain

prestige.title: Prestige
prestige.description: We have developed and implemented a security system based on our blockchain

magnet.title: Magnet
magnet.description: We have developed a system for monitoring and accounting of discount cards, and also implemented it in the blockchain
